name: carPremium

children.description: Version, edition or submodel of car

children.description: Another submodel level of car

children.name: chargetrip_version
children.description: Car model version. Added by Chargetrip as an alternative for when a car manufacturer does not provide an version name, or uses the same version name across all trims or consecutive years

children.name: standard
children.description: The car standard charge

children.name: power
children.description: Maximum power OBC can accept to charge a battery (standard OBC)

children.name: phases
children.description: Number of phases the OBC accepts to achieve maximum power (standard OBC)

children.name: phase_amperage
children.description: Maximum current the OBC accepts per phase to achieve maximum power (standard OBC)

children.name: charge_time
children.description: Minutes needed to charge from 0% to 100% SoC (standard OBC)

children.name: charge_speed
children.description: Charging speed when charging at maximum power (standard OBC)

children.name: is_estimated
children.description: Indicates if Charge_Standard fields are estimated

children.description: Charging details for the standard OBC on several charging points

children.description: Indicates if and what battery fields are estimated

children.name: B
children.description: Both of the battery kwh fields are estimations

children.description: full_kwh field is estimated

children.name: N
children.description: None of the battery kwh fields are estimations

children.name: U
children.description: useable_kwh field is estimated

children.name: vehicle_platform
children.description: Name of vehicle platform used for vehicle (often abbreviated to indicate group platforms)

children.name: vehicle_platform_is_dedicated
children.description: Indicates if the vehicle platform used for vehicle is a dedicated battery electric vehicle platform

children.name: status
children.description:
Availability of car

Values:
   - 0 = Car no longer for sale in any market / region
   - 1 = Car currently for sale in at least one market / region
   - 2 = Car expected in market from Date_From (estimated), pre-order open
   - 3 = Car expected in market from Date_From (estimated), pre-order unkown or not open
   - 12 = Concept car, nearing production and/or confirmed, pre-order open
   - 13 = Concept car, nearing production and/or confirmed, pre-order unknown or not open
   - 22 = Concept car, not close to production and/or unconfirmed, pre-order open
   - 23 = Concept car, not close to production and/or unconfirmed, pre-order unknown
   - 91 = Status uncertain, introduction date and/or pricing unclear

children.name: date_from
children.description: Date of introduction, mm-yyyy

children.name: date_from_is_estimated
children.description: Indicates if date from field is estimated

children.name: date_to
children.description: Date last available, mm-yyyy

children.name: type
children.description:
Type of drivetrain

Values:
  - BEV = Battery Electric Car
  - EREV = Extended Range Electric Car

children.name: fuel
children.description:
Fuel type

Values:
  - E = Electricity only, full electric car

children.name: propulsion
children.description:
Propulsion type

Values:
  - AWD = All wheel drive car
  - Front = Front wheel drive car
  - Rear = Rear wheel drive car

children.name: propulsion_is_estimated
children.description: Indicates if propulsion field is estimated

children.name: power
children.description: Maximum (combined) power output in kw

children.name: power_is_estimated
children.description: Indicates if power field is estimated

children.name: power_hp
children.description: Maximum (combined) power output in horsepower (PS)

children.name: torque
children.description: Maximum (combined) torque output in newtonmeter

children.name: torque_is_estimated
children.description: Indicates if torque field is estimated

children.name: acceleration
children.description: Acceleration 0-100 km/h in seconds

children.name: acceleration_is_estimated
children.description: Indicates if acceleration field is estimated

children.name: top_speed
children.description: Top speed of car in km/h

children.name: top_speed_is_estimated
children.description: Indicates if top_speed field is estimated

children.name: wltp
children.description: Rated range in WLTP combined cycle (NULL if not WLTP rated) in km

children.name: wltp_is_estimated
children.description: Indicates if WLTP range is estimated (NULL if not WLTP rated)

children.name: wltp_teh
children.description: Rated range in WLTP (TEH / least efficient trim) combined cycle (NULL if not WLTP rated)

children.name: nedc
children.description: Rated range in NEDC combined cycle (NULL if not NEDC rated) in km

children.name: nedc_is_estimated
children.description: Indicates if NEDC range is estimated (NULL if not NEDC rated)

children.name: real
children.description: Index range in EV Database RealRange model in km

children.name: real_is_estimated
children.description: Indicates what RealRange mode the model is has calculated figures

children.description: Worst conditions are based on -10°C and use of heating

children.name: chargetrip_range
children.description:
Is an index value of what we consider to be the real-world range.
(Comparable to Range_Real from EV Database.) It is essentially a normalized range to display in the front-end.

children.name: fast_charging_is_supported
children.description:
EVs that support fast charging have a minimum charging speed of 43 Kwh.
EVs without support for fast charging used in a newRoute mutation will return an error.
